name: Shadow of the Wolf
author: Katherine Stark
description:
Shadow of the Wolf is a mission series for Lancer written by Katherine Stark, designed for groups who enjoy roleplay and politics alongside challenging mech combat.

This LCP includes three new mechs: the RKF Taraxacum, the HORUS Hecatoncheires, and the RKF Tagetes. Additionally it contains new pilot gear and exotic systems, backgrounds for Karrakin characters, and four new bonds: the Firebrand, the Celebrant, the Knave, and the Seneschal.
